Description: Fragment of a wheel-made pottery ring-shaped sanctuary lamp, with inward-facing wick-holes and a notched inner edge. Decorated with a brown slip. Fine orange-brown fabric with very fine mica, grey white inclusions <0.5mm.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q370)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (KA.03) (Phase 1)
